product_name: Aventura Novack Hoodie Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: On the beach and the wind whips up? You'll be glad to pull on the Aventura Novack Hoodie Shirt, with its elbow-length sleeves and eye-catching graphic design. 100% cotton jersey feels soft and breathable. Hood pulls up for light protection from sun or wind. Deep V-neck front; elbow-length sleeves. The Aventura Novack Hoodie Shirt features a classic fit for comfort. Closeout.
short_description: On the beach and the wind whips up? You'll be glad to pull on the Aventura Novack Hoodie Shirt, with its elbow-length sleeves and eye-catching graphic design.
